pullRequest.title: SQL: Project and filter operators
pullRequest.bodyText:
Implemented project and filter operators.
Limitations:

We have hard-coded batch size inside the FilterExec for now because we do not have a memory management yet. In the future we will switch to dynamic memory allocation.

Closes #16893
